subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goaltender Scott Clemmensen rejoined the Devils to back up Martin Brodeur, a job that hardly results in much ice time. But now Clemmensen is piling one good game atop another.
snippet: Goaltender Scott Clemmensen rejoined the Devils to back up Martin Brodeur, a job that hardly results in much ice time. But now Clemmensen is piling one good game atop another.
